attributes.text: R3M, a member of the top-tier forum Exploit, is auctioning VPN access with domain administrator privileges to the network of an unspecified business services company located in Sweden with $40 million in annual revenue. The starting price is $5,000 or it can be purchased directly for $20,000. The credibility of R3M is moderate: the user registered in October 2020 and has authored 90 threads and posts. The account has received 7 endorsements on the forum.

topic.name: Threat Lead
topic.description: New or notable threat actors, malware, or threat activity observed on the dark web, via proprietary means, or through technical campaign analysis

attributes.title: “R3M” Auctioning VPN Access to Network of Unspecified Company in Sweden
